action_result:
By typing "usb-c" into the search bar, the screen has now displayed a list of related items, such as "usb-c to usb cord," "usb charging block," and "usb-c to hdmi adapter." This action has brought the results closer to your request because you can now choose a specific item to add to your shopping cart on Target related to the search term "usb-c." 

However, the next step is to select an item from the list and add it to the cart, which will complete your request of adding "usb-c" to the cart.
